conclusion: Analyze the v-t graph to determine maximum distance between truck and bus during braking.
Truck initially at 40 m/s, bus at 30 m/s; truck slows to 10 m/s in 10 s, bus to 10 m/s in 20 s.
Calculate deceleration: truck at -3 m/s², bus at -1 m/s².
Determine time when velocities equal: t = 5 s.
Calculate distance covered by truck up to t = 5 s: 162.5 m.
Calculate distance covered by bus up to t = 5 s: 137.5 m.
New separation at t = 5 s is 25 m; maximum separation is 55 m.
The maximum distance between the two vehicles is 55 meters.
